attributes.action: Ensure the former Setanta Premier Leauge games are shown on FTA TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Setanta has defaulted on they're payment to the EPL. The Government should intervene to ensure the 46 game package is only granted to a channel freely available. A free to air terrestrial or digital channel should be made mandatory

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
